document_data.mainbody:
Nightstar Guiding and Outfitters was a general shop found in Waymoot, Cormyr, that catered to travelers and foresters.
In addition to supplying quality trail gear such as ropes, maps, boots, and other goods, the store was a popular hangout for travelers and adventurers who enjoyed each others company and swapped tales over brandy or hot tea.
The store was owned and operated by Liriel Nightstar, who was also rumored to be a member of the Harpers.
